UniprotID	Q9Y266
Accession	Q9Y266;Q5QP31;Q5QP35;Q9H0N2;Q9Y2B6
EntryName	NUDC_HUMAN
ProteinName	Nuclear migration protein nudC (Nuclear distribution protein C homolog)
GeneName	NUDC
Length	331
Function	Plays a role in neurogenesis and neuronal migration (By similarity). Necessary for correct formation of mitotic spindles and chromosome separation during mitosis (PubMed:12679384, PubMed:12852857, PubMed:25789526). Necessary for cytokinesis and cell proliferation (PubMed:12679384, PubMed:12852857).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton; Spindle; Midbody
